name: '''Hayao Miyazaki'''
occupation: Film director, animator, screenwriter, manga artist
influences: Isao Takahata, Yasuo Ōtsuka, Lev Atamanov, Paul Grimault, Chuck Jones, Fleischer Brothers, Frédéric Back, Yōichi Kotabe, Kazuhide Tomonaga, Yoshifumi Kondō, Peter Lord, Nikolay Petrovich Fyodorov, Nick Park, Osamu Tezuka, Sanpei Shirato, Shigeru Sugiura, Yoshiharu Tsuge, Daijiro Morohoshi, Kunio Yanagita, Akira Kurosawa, Charlie Chaplin, John Ford, Sergei Eisenstein, David Lean, Andrzej Wajda, Andrei Tarkovsky, J. R. R. Tolkien, Ursula K. Le Guin, Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, Jules Verne, Kenji Miyazawa, Henry Justice Ford, Jean Giraud, John Everett Millais, John William Waterhouse, Tetsuji Fukushima, Ivan Bilibin
influenced: Hiro Mashima, Toyoo Ashida, Hideaki Anno, Yoshiyuki Sadamoto, Katsuya Kondō, Kenichi Yoshida (animator)
